title: Failing to configure compilers on ORNL Titan
body:
I am having a trouble to set up compilers on ORNL Titan.

Here is my module environment.
```shell
titan-ext1 teranish/spack> module list
Currently Loaded Modulefiles:
  1) eswrap/1.3.3-1.020200.1278.0          11) hsi/5.0.2.p1                          21) alps/5.2.4-2.0502.9774.31.12.gem
  2) craype-network-gemini                 12) DefApps                               22) rca/1.0.0-2.0502.60530.1.63.gem
  3) gcc/5.3.0                             13) cray-libsci/16.11.1                   23) atp/2.0.5
  4) craype/2.5.9                          14) udreg/2.3.2-1.0502.10518.2.17.gem     24) PrgEnv-gnu/5.2.82
  5) cray-mpich/7.5.2                      15) ugni/6.0-1.0502.10863.8.28.gem        25) modules/3.2.10.5
  6) craype-interlagos                     16) pmi/5.0.11                            26) cmake3/3.6.1
  7) lustredu/1.4                          17) dmapp/7.0.1-1.0502.11080.8.74.gem     27) cray-hdf5-parallel/1.8.14
  8) xalt/0.7.5                            18) gni-headers/4.0-1.0502.10859.7.8.gem  28) mercurial/2.6.3
  9) module_msg/0.1                        19) xpmem/0.1-2.0502.64982.5.3.gem
 10) modulator/1.2.0                       20) dvs/2.5_0.9.0-1.0502.2188.1.113.gem
```
Then,
